translation.en: [TV announcer 1] It's that special time of year, the holidays,
translation.zh: 又到了一年中特殊的节日时分

translation.en: where we gather together with the people we love
translation.zh: 我们会跟爱的人团聚
一起大吃大喝

translation.en: This is making me so hungry. Maybe there's something else on.
translation.zh: 这让我好饿啊 会有别的节目看吧？
对啊

translation.en: [TV announcer 2] It isn't a real holiday if you don't have tasty, delicious food.
translation.zh: 要是没有美食相伴就不算是真正过节了
看看这些美食啊

translation.en: But, Moch, our ice is all we've got while the store's on holiday vacation.
translation.zh: 小薯啊 商店也放假了 我们只有冰吃

translation.en: -Who could that be? -[murmurs] I don't know.
translation.zh: -是谁打来呢？-我不知道
嗨 史蒂夫
节日快乐啊 松饼和麻薯！
看好了！

translation.en: I'm cooking up a batch of Steve's famous latkes over here for Hanukkah.
translation.zh: 我正在做史蒂夫的拿手好菜土豆烙饼 为光明节做准备
你们的节日过得如何？
我们的节日？
我们没有节日啊
你们的节日叫什么？
哦 我们的节日？
我们的节日叫冰…
冰冻节？
-对-冰冻节！

translation.en: I bet you two stellar chefs are cooking up a huge Freezie Day feast!
translation.zh: 我想二位厨艺精湛的大厨一定会做一顿冰冻节饕餮盛宴！

translation.en: Well, where do I even start? Hm…
translation.zh: 哎 我甚至不知该从哪儿说起

translation.en: There's so much food. Too much, actually.
translation.zh: 好多食物啊 其实有点太多了

translation.en: I wish you could come over and eat all this food.
translation.zh: 你要是能过来吃所有这些食物就好了

translation.en: Really? You mean that? This is so exciting!
translation.zh: 真的吗？你没开玩笑吧？ 太激动人心了！
史蒂夫？
会是谁来了呢？
冰冻节快乐！

translation.en: Now, where's all the tasty food?
translation.zh: 好吃的都在哪儿呢？

translation.en: -How on earth did you even-- -Oh, you must be Waffles and Mochi!
translation.zh: -你到底是怎么…-你们一定是松饼和麻薯了！
我叫扫把希尔达 是史蒂夫的搭档

translation.en: He has told me all about the food that you have prepared for…
translation.zh: 他跟我说你们做了好多吃的是准备来庆祝…
叫什么来着？
冰冻节！

translation.en: Don't worry, Steve Jr., the food will be out soon.
translation.zh: 别担心 小史蒂夫 你很快就能吃上了

translation.en: -[whispers] Mochi, can I talk to you? -Uh-huh. [murmurs]
translation.zh: 麻薯 我能跟你谈谈吗？

translation.en: Mochi, we don't have any food.
translation.zh: 麻薯 我们什么吃的都没有

translation.en: Freezie Day isn't a real holiday without food. What do we do, Moch?
translation.zh: 没有吃的冰冻节就不算真正的节日了 怎么办呢 小薯？
对啊 你说得对 麻薯

translation.en: If we give our guests a great big holiday feast,
translation.zh: 如果我们给客人做一顿节日盛宴

translation.en: maybe we can make Freezie Day a real holiday!
translation.zh: 也许我们就能把冰冻节变成真正的节日了！
好 我们让晚餐成真吧

translation.en: Take the Magicart and bring back holiday foods.
translation.zh: 你坐魔法马车出去把节日食物带回来
你不在时 我来分散他们的注意力

translation.en: But remember, you gotta be back before the sun goes down.
translation.zh: 但要记住 你得在太阳下山之前回来

translation.en: It's a holiday, not a holi-night.
translation.zh: 这是节“日” 不是节“夜”
出发吧 倒数三、二…
发射升空！
松饼与麻薯：佳节盛宴

translation.en: I've heard of a ton of holidays that happen around this time of year
translation.zh: 每年冬至这个时候的节日我听说过的有很多

translation.en: for winter solstice, but never Freezie Day!
translation.zh: 每年冬至这个时候的节日我听说过的有很多 但从没听过冰冻节！
什么是冬至？

translation.en: It's the shortest day and the longest night of the year.
translation.zh: 这是一年中白昼最短夜晚最长的一天
来 听我解释

translation.en: See the position of the Earth, how it's tilted while it orbits the sun?
translation.zh: 你看地球的位置它围绕太阳转时 角度是倾斜的
地球上的四季就是这样来的！
所以每年大约在12月21日这天

translation.en: the position of the Earth means half of our planet experiences winter,
translation.zh: 地球的位置意味着地球上一半的地方正在经历冬天

translation.en: making it the shortest daytime of the year!
translation.zh: 这天的白昼是全年最短的！
但最酷的部分是

translation.en: When it's the shortest day of the year here,
translation.zh: 当这里经历着全年最短的白昼时

translation.en: it's the longest day of the year here,
translation.zh: 这里的白昼却是全年最长的
也就是说 这里正是夏天

translation.en: That's right. Down Under, Christmas is a summer holiday.
translation.zh: 没错 在澳大利亚圣诞节是夏天的节日

translation.en: So right now, it's summer and winter at the same time!
translation.zh: 所以现在既是夏天 也是冬天！
几千年来

translation.en: civilizations around the world have celebrated winter solstice
translation.zh: 世界各地的文明都会庆祝冬至

translation.en: because the sun and seasons are so important to our food and lives.
translation.zh: 因为太阳和季节对我们的饮食和生活都很重要
对哦！我们的任务

translation.en: You need to bring back food for a Freezie Day Feast before sundown,
translation.zh: 你得在日落前带回在冰冻节盛宴上吃的美食

translation.en: and I know just the winter holiday for you.
translation.zh: 我知道哪个冬日的节日最适合你们了
马卡希基节！

translation.en: [Magicart laughs] Yep, this is winter in Hawaii.
translation.zh: 没错 夏威夷的冬天就是这样的

translation.en: Makahiki is an indigenous Hawaiian holiday feast that lasts…
translation.zh: 马卡希基节是夏威夷原住民的节日 会持续…
听好了…
四个月！

translation.en: I know just the person for you to meet.
translation.zh: 我知道要带你见谁了

translation.en: My chef friend, Kimi Swimmy, knows all about Makahiki.
translation.zh: 我的厨师朋友奇米·斯威米她对马卡希基节了如指掌
夏威夷 你好啊！

translation.en: Okay, Mochi, aim for Kimi's boogie board!
translation.zh: 好了 麻薯 降落到奇米的冲浪板上！
-你是谁？-我叫麻薯！
你好啊 麻薯！

translation.en: Oh, we're gonna go celebrate Makahiki today. I'm getting fish for it.
translation.zh: 我们今天要庆祝马卡希基节我在抓要吃的鱼呢

translation.en: [Kimi] There's a bunch of fish down there. We call them u'u,
translation.zh: 海里面有好多鱼 我们叫它们乌乌

translation.en: and they live in these dark caves at the bottom of the ocean.
translation.zh: 它们住在海底的黑暗洞穴里

translation.en: And I have to hold my breath and go down,
translation.zh: 我必须屏住呼吸潜下水

translation.en: and then that's when I'm able to take my spear and catch 'em.
translation.zh: 然后我就能拿起长矛捕鱼了

translation.en: We always want these fish to be reproducing and growing
translation.zh: 我们一直希望这些鱼能不断繁殖、生长
维持海洋健康

translation.en: -I'm only taking what I need. -[Mochi] Wow!
translation.zh: 我只是取我所需

translation.en: We're gonna go fry these up for our Makahiki feast. Wanna come?
translation.zh: 我们会把鱼煎了在马卡希基盛宴上吃 想来吗？
稍微高一点
稍微低一点
稍微高一点
稍微低一点
请进！
冰冻节快乐！
为了好玩 我们饿了！

translation.en: I hope it's okay. I invited our friends from the store.
translation.zh: 希望你不介意我邀请了店里的朋友

translation.en: And we invited world-renowned chef Samin Nosrat.
translation.zh: 我们还邀请了世界著名厨师萨米·诺斯莱特
-什么？-冰冻节快乐！
没关系 我很好
麻薯 快回家吧
欢迎来到我的后院

translation.en: -Mochi, you gonna help me cook some fish? -[murmurs] Yeah!
translation.zh: -麻薯 你要帮我煎鱼吗？-好啊！

translation.en: So, a lot of times, people eat fish as fish fillets,
translation.zh: 很多时候 人们吃的是鱼排

translation.en: where they're just in these rectangles and they don't have any skins or bones,
translation.zh: 都是长方形的肉片 没有鱼皮或骨头
但我们会煮整条鱼

translation.en: So you're always gonna remember that it's a fish.
translation.zh: 这样你们就永远会记得这是一条鱼

translation.en: [Kimi] Mochi, while I finish up, why don't you help the kids make some poi?
translation.zh: 麻薯 我要收一下尾要不你去帮孩子们做芋泥吧？

translation.en: Poi is mashed kalo that you pound with this kind of rock.
translation.zh: 芋泥就是用这种石头捣碎的芋头
来吃吧 各位
噢 哇！大家都饿了

translation.en: [woman] So Makahiki is all about a change of season.
translation.zh: 马卡希基节是为了庆祝季节更替

translation.en: We celebrate the land's abundance to feed us.
translation.zh: 我们赞颂这片喂饱我们的丰饶土地
夏威夷人很爱吃
谁不爱吃呢？

translation.en: There's just something really special about eating close to home
translation.zh: 吃家园附近的食物和只取自己所需

translation.en: and only taking what you need
translation.zh: 有非常特别之处

translation.en: because that's how you take care of your home.
translation.zh: 因为这是保护好家园的方式

translation.en: There's a bite of fish if you want.
translation.zh: 要是你想 来吃一口鱼吧

translation.en: -[Mochi murmurs and purrs] -[Kimi] What do you think?
translation.zh: 好吃吗？

translation.en: That's really what we're celebrating when we celebrate Makahiki.
translation.zh: 这就是我们庆祝马卡希基节时真正要庆祝的

translation.en: Food and the land and the community.
translation.zh: 食物、土地和社群

translation.en: And that's worth celebrating, don't you think?
translation.zh: 这些是值得庆祝的 你不觉得吗？
没错 麻薯

translation.en: If you take care of the food, the food will take care of you.
translation.zh: 如果你照顾好食物食物也会照顾好你的

translation.en: Hey, Mochi, wanna play a game?
translation.zh: 嘿 麻薯 你想玩游戏吗？
加油 麻薯！

translation.en: [woman] Here you go, Mochi. Now you're part of the ohana.
translation.zh: 给你 麻薯你成为欧哈娜的一份子了
那是家人的意思

translation.en: Ah no, who could that be?
translation.zh: 不好 会是谁呢？
冰冻节快乐！
忙忙 你也来了啊？

translation.en: Well, I'm famished, but where's all the food?
translation.zh: 我饿死了 但吃的都在哪儿啊？
你好啊 史蒂夫 你好啊 萨米

translation.en: So, Waffles, tell me all about your menu inspiration.
translation.zh: 松饼 跟我好好说说你的菜单的灵感吧

translation.en: I wanna know everything about this party.
translation.zh: 我想详细地了解这场派对

translation.en: -Uh… -You must have been cooking for days!
translation.zh: 你和麻薯一定烹饪了好几天了

translation.en: Hey, everyone! Look what I found!
translation.zh: 嘿 各位！看我找到了什么！
这是甜筒雪糕制造机耶！

translation.en: [gasps] No, Steve, don't flip the switch!
translation.zh: 打住 史蒂夫 别扳开关！
扳开关！
不好 那是我们的吹雪机

translation.en: Guys, I just need to turn this thing off quick. [grunts]
translation.zh: 各位 我需要快点把这机器关掉
我没事
你们好呀！
翠西·艾利斯·罗斯来了！
-大家好啊 嗨！-嗨 翠西！

translation.en: Shelfie invited me. We're in yoga class together.
translation.zh: 是货架谢尔菲请我来的我们一起上了瑜伽课
我错过了冰冻节吗？

translation.en: Your timing, like your talent, is impeccable, Tracee.
translation.zh: 翠西 你的时机掌握得和你的天赋一样完美

translation.en: We're just about to eat snow cones.
translation.zh: 我们正准备吃甜筒雪糕呢

translation.en: Ooh, well, I can't say no cone to a snow cone.
translation.zh: 我没办法拒绝甜筒雪糕
救命啊 麻薯！

translation.en: -[horn honks] -Mochi, say aloha. We gotta jet!
translation.zh: 麻薯 快说再见吧 我们要飞了！

translation.en: Take as much poi as you need and anything else you want.
translation.zh: 好吧 你需要拿多少芋泥都行别的也随便拿
再见了 麻薯！

translation.en: [Waffles] I hope that's Mochi and the food.
translation.zh: 我希望是麻薯和吃的回来了
-糕点师！-你好啊！
冰冻节快乐！
冰冻节快乐！
嘿 猜猜我带了什么？

translation.en: Oh yes! Is that what I think it is?
translation.zh: 太好了！和我想的一样吗？

translation.en: [baker] Our friends the Pupcakes, of course!
translation.zh: 当然是我们的朋友纸杯狗狗啦！
噢 是纸杯狗狗呀

translation.en: Yay, even more mouths to feed. Cool.
translation.zh: 真好 更多嗷嗷待哺的嘴巴了 很棒

translation.en: I knew you would be so happy.
translation.zh: 我就知道你会很开心的

translation.en: [sighs] I think I better call Mochi.
translation.zh: 我想我最好打给麻薯
小薯 吃的呢？
-新鲜的夏威夷芋泥？-对啊

translation.en: Well, that sounds like an amazing holiday food,
translation.zh: 听起来是很棒的节日食物

translation.en: but we have way more guests than we thought.
translation.zh: 但客人比我们想象的要多得多

translation.en: We're gonna need even more food for our Freezie Day dinner.
translation.zh: 我们的冰冻节晚餐需要更多的食物

translation.en: Well, since it's the winter solstice,
translation.zh: 既然是冬至

translation.en: we could go to Sweden for Saint Lucy's Day,
translation.zh: 我们可以去瑞典参加圣露西节

translation.en: or we could go to Guatemala for Fiesta de Santo Tomás,
translation.zh: 或者去危地马拉参加圣托马斯节
或去中国庆祝冬至 或…

translation.en: Wait! I know where we should go to top off your Freezie Day feast.
translation.zh: 等等！我知道要去哪里补充冰冻节盛宴的美食了
挪威！

translation.en: The Sámi people there celebrate Juovllat,
translation.zh: 那里的萨米族人会庆祝圣诞节

translation.en: a cozy holiday when families gather to sing
translation.zh: 这是个非常温暖的节日家人聚在一起唱歌

translation.en: and eat special foods they've saved all winter.
translation.zh: 吃存储来过冬的特别食物

translation.en: Let's go see my friend Maret in Norway. She's a reindeer herder.
translation.zh: 我们去挪威见见我的朋友玛瑞吧她是驯鹿牧民

translation.en: She can hook you up with food for your Freezie Day dinner.
translation.zh: 她可以带你获得冰冻节晚餐的食物

translation.en: Well, just get back with lots of food, okay? Before sundown.
translation.zh: 那你要带多点食物回来 好吗？要赶在日落之前回到
快点吧 小薯！
麻薯 我们去挪威了！ 哈喽！
准备在挪威降落！
准备紧急迫降！
我叫麻薯！
再见！
抱歉啊
那是我的驯鹿米西
今天是圣诞节
圣诞节？

translation.en: You have to celebrate the Juovllat with us.
translation.zh: 你得和我们一起庆祝圣诞节

translation.en: Do you know how to drive the snowmobile?
translation.zh: 你会驾驶雪地摩托车吗？

translation.en: Let's go to get something to eat.
translation.zh: 我们去找点东西吃吧
你喜欢煎饼吗？

translation.en: For our holiday, Juovllat, we make Sami pancakes.
translation.zh: 我们在圣诞节会做萨米薄煎饼
-一个-一
-两个-二
-三个-三
-四个-四
-五个-五
放点糖
再加点牛奶
小麦粉
还有一些驯鹿血

translation.en: [Maret] Sámi people eat reindeer because reindeer eat lichen under the snow
translation.zh: 萨米族人会吃驯鹿 因为驯鹿会吃雪下的青苔

translation.en: which gives us vitamins we can't get in winter without them.
translation.zh: 我们从中摄取维生素这是冬天唯一的维生素来源

translation.en: We take care of reindeer, and they take care of us.
translation.zh: 我们会照顾驯鹿 它们也会照顾我们

translation.en: [Waffles] Come on, Moch. Where are you?
translation.zh: 拜托 小薯 你在哪里？

translation.en: Hey, Waffles, come listen to Samin.
translation.zh: 嘿 松饼 来听听萨米讲话吧

translation.en: In Iran, we have a holiday called Yalda.
translation.zh: 在伊朗 我们有个叫雅尔达的节日

translation.en: It's a winter celebration that dates back 2500 years.
translation.zh: 这是有2500年历史的冬日庆典

translation.en: Let me show you. These are some of my favorite foods we eat.
translation.zh: 给你们看看吧这些是节日里我最爱吃的食物
-有西瓜-看起来很好吃
还有石榴
松饼啊 一整晚

translation.en: all we do is eat and eat and eat.
translation.zh: -我们就是不停地吃-太酷了

translation.en: -Just like we're gonna do here tonight. -Yes!
translation.zh: -就像我们今晚要做的一样-对！

translation.en: Freezie Day will never be real without some food.
translation.zh: 要是没有食物冰冻节就永远不能成真了
失陪了
太酷了

translation.en: -[Mochi murmurs] -Mochi, are you on your way?
translation.zh: 麻薯 你在回来的路上了吗？

translation.en: What? You are still in Norway?
translation.zh: 什么？ 你还在挪威？
你还在挪威？

translation.en: Oh, Mrs. O's calling. She'll know what to do.
translation.zh: 奥夫人打来了 她肯定有办法
松饼 冰冻节快乐！

translation.en: -What? How did you know? -Shelfie told me all about it.
translation.zh: -什么？你怎么知道的？-货架谢尔菲都跟我说了
晚餐怎么样？
很好啊
除了食物之外

translation.en: Look, can I tell you something, Waffles?
translation.zh: 听着 能告诉你一件事吗 松饼？

translation.en: Our Christmas turkey didn't go as planned either.
translation.zh: 我们的圣诞节火鸡也发生了意外
我把火鸡烧焦了
-是吗？-对 但没关系
我们一起玩得很开心
是奥夫人吗？

translation.en: -Happy Freezie Day! Mrs. O, everybody! -[Samin] Hi, Mrs. O!
translation.zh: -冰冻节快乐！各位 是奥夫人！-嗨 奥夫人！

translation.en: You guys singing any good Freezie Day songs?
translation.zh: 你们有唱什么美妙的冰冻节歌曲吗？
有很多

translation.en: I'd love to sing, but we don't have a piano.
translation.zh: 我想唱几首 但这里没有钢琴
我有
你有钢琴吗？

translation.en: [Busy] Of course she does. She's Tracee Ellis Ross!
translation.zh: 她当然有她可是翠西·艾利斯·罗斯呢！
一名真正的艺术家

translation.en: You're putting a lot of pressure on me, Busy.
translation.zh: 忙忙 你让我压力好大啊

translation.en: Teach us a Freezie Day song, won't you, Waffles?
translation.zh: 松饼 教我们一首冰冻节的歌吧
对啊 松饼

translation.en: Go, Waffles, go! Teach us a good song.
translation.zh: 加油 松饼！教我们唱一首美妙的歌
不管那么多了
今天是值得庆祝的日子

translation.en: ♪ There's dinner plates It's Freezie Day ♪
translation.zh: 餐盘丰盛 今天是冰冻节
-我喜欢！-我也喜欢
我们会享用
一餐盛宴？

translation.en: -Yeah, we'll eat a traditional feast. -[Tracee] So sweet!
translation.zh: -对 我们要吃传统盛宴-真美好！
-今天是冰冻节-冰冻节
我好喜欢！
-对啊-真好听

translation.en: [sighs] Mochi, I'm counting on you, bud.
translation.zh: 麻薯 靠你了 兄弟

translation.en: [Maret] Our traditional place to cook is the lavvu.
translation.zh: 拉乌是我们传统的烹饪场所

translation.en: -I'm making blood pancakes on the fire. -Oh…
translation.zh: 现在我在火上做血煎饼

translation.en: [Maret] And then we add the cloudberry jam.
translation.zh: 然后会淋上云莓酱

translation.en: [Maret] Cloudberries are a golden berry we love to pick in the summertime.
translation.zh: 夏天的时候我们很爱采摘云莓这种金色莓果

translation.en: -We have made a gift for you. -[murmurs]
translation.zh: 我们给你做了礼物

translation.en: Mochi! We gotta get back to Waffles and Freezie Day!
translation.zh: 麻薯！我们得回去找松饼过冰冻节了！

translation.en: Wait! Before you go, I have made some of my cloudberry jam for you.
translation.zh: 等等！在你走之前拿一点我给你做的云莓酱吧
再见！

translation.en: Let's let Waffles know the good news!
translation.zh: 快把好消息告诉松饼吧！

translation.en: Wow, Moch, you got cloudberry jam in Norway?
translation.zh: 哇 小薯 你从挪威带了云莓酱吗？
太好了 你救了我们的节日！

translation.en: When will you be home? The sun is gonna set any minute now.
translation.zh: 你什么时候回家？太阳马上就要落山了

translation.en: We need to serve Freezie Day dinner before the sun goes down.
translation.zh: 我们要在太阳下山之前把冰冻节晚餐端上桌
我们在路上了 松饼！
没什么能阻挡我们了

translation.en: Just gotta get through this tiny blizzard up ahead, and then we're cool.
translation.zh: 我们只需要穿过前方的小暴风雪然后就畅通无阻了
你是说小暴风雪吗？

translation.en: Yeah, but it's nothing ol' Magicart can't handle!
translation.zh: 对 但没什么是老魔法马车应对不了的！
小心！
小心！
麻薯、魔法马车 你们在吗？
小心！

translation.en: Oh no. No, no, no. The sun.
translation.zh: 糟了 不好 太阳啊
糟了

translation.en: Oh no, Mochi, the sun went down!
translation.zh: 糟糕 麻薯 太阳落山了！
我们失败了！
你还好吗？

translation.en: Of course. Don't I look like I'm okay?
translation.zh: 当然了 我看起来难道不好吗？

translation.en: To be honest, no, not really.
translation.zh: 老实说 不太好
糕点师
能告诉你一件事吗？
你尽管说吧
冰冻节不是真的节日

translation.en: Mochi and I made it up.
translation.zh: 是麻薯和我编出来的

translation.en: The truth is we have no holiday, no food,
translation.zh: 事实是我们没有节日 没有食物

translation.en: and now Mochi and Magicart are caught in a blizzard. [squeals]
translation.zh: 现在麻薯和魔法马车还被困在了暴风雪里
过来
过来
好了 过来

translation.en: -It's time you told everyone the truth. -[sniffles]
translation.zh: 我觉得你该把真相告诉大家了
闯出来了！

translation.en: We did make it! We survived!
translation.zh: 我们真的闯出来了 我们活下来了
怎么回事…
有东西从我们旁边出现了

translation.en: And then you, Samin, you were so excited.
translation.zh: 然后萨米你特别兴奋

translation.en: Then the Pupcakes came and they were all over the place.
translation.zh: 纸杯狗狗也来了 到处都是

translation.en: And one thing led to another and…
translation.zh: 事情一件接一件发生 然后…
冰冻节是不存在的！
什么？

translation.en: Wait, so am I not really here?
translation.zh: 等等 所以我其实不在这里吗？

translation.en: Is this a dream? Am I in a simulation?
translation.zh: 这是梦吗？我在模拟情境里吗？
麻薯！

translation.en: Oh, Mochi, so glad you're back safe.
translation.zh: 麻薯 很高兴你安全回来了

translation.en: But the jig is up. They know Freezie Day isn't real.
translation.zh: 可是诡计被拆穿了大家知道了冰冻节不是真的
对不起

translation.en: So the holidays aren't just about food.
translation.zh: 但节日不只是为了吃吃喝喝
-没错-对

translation.en: They're about, you know, being with family and friends.
translation.zh: 是为了跟家人和朋友聚在一起

translation.en: And singing songs and playing games.
translation.zh: 还有唱歌和玩游戏

translation.en: And more than that, they're about the universal traditions
translation.zh: 更重要的是 有史以来节日就将人类团结在一起

translation.en: that have been bringing humans together since the dawn of time.
translation.zh: 这是人类共有的传统
但也少不了食物 对吧？

translation.en: Well, the sun went down though.
translation.zh: 但太阳已经落山了

translation.en: You know, not to bring up my super cool holiday again,
translation.zh: 我不是故意要说我那超酷的节日

translation.en: but Yalda actually starts after the sun goes down.
translation.zh: 但雅尔达节正是在太阳落山后才开始庆祝的
而且要庆祝一整晚
一整晚？

translation.en: Moch, do you know what this means?
translation.zh: 小薯 知道这意味着什么吗？
冰冻节依然能成真！
弹琴吧 翠西
今天这一天

translation.en: ♪ We celebrate with all our friends And eat real late ♪
translation.zh: 我们跟朋友同庆 很晚才开吃
今天是冰冻节

translation.en: ♪ And we will cook a traditional feast ♪
translation.zh: 我们会做一餐传统盛宴

translation.en: [Steve] ♪ We'll whisk and chop And use other techniques! ♪
translation.zh: 我们搅拌、切剁 也用上别的技艺！
今天是冰冻节

translation.en: Mochi, look! Freezie Day is real.
translation.zh: 麻薯 你看！冰冻节是真的

translation.en: We made our own holiday tradition.
translation.zh: 我们创造了自己的节日传统
我们唱歌、做饭

translation.en: and we're up way past our bedtime.
translation.zh: 睡觉时间早已经过了但我们还在庆祝
谁想吃甜筒雪糕？
我！

translation.en: ♪ A special time to be together ♪
translation.zh: 在这个特别时光 我们共聚一堂

translation.en: ♪ You can feel the magic in the air ♪
translation.zh: 空气中魔力四散

translation.en: ♪ See the smiles around the table ♪
translation.zh: 桌子旁笑容满满

translation.en: ♪ A time to give and a time to share ♪
translation.zh: 这是奉献和分享的时光
有些传统要我们发扬
比如保存甜果酱

translation.en: ♪ And there's my favorite treat That I love to serve ♪
translation.zh: 和我最喜欢端上的甜点
就是撒满莓果的甜筒
这就是我们的开胃小点
是啊 和朋友们共聚一堂
每样食物都变得更香
今天这一天

translation.en: ♪ We celebrate With hearts as full as dinner plates ♪
translation.zh: 我们抱着和美餐一样充实的心来庆祝
今天是冰冻节
我们唱歌欢笑
餐食丰盛
剩菜够我们吃上几星期
今天是冰冻节
今天这一天

translation.en: ♪ We celebrate With hearts as full as dinner plates ♪
translation.zh: 我们抱着和美餐一样充实的心来庆祝
今天是冰冻节
我们唱歌欢笑
餐食丰盛
剩菜够我们吃上几星期
今天是冰冻节
今天这一天

translation.en: ♪ We celebrate With hearts as full as dinner plates ♪
translation.zh: 我们抱着和美餐一样充实的心来庆祝
今天是冰冻节
我们唱歌欢笑

translation.en: ♪ There's lots to eat We'll have leftovers for weeks ♪
translation.zh: 餐食丰盛 剩菜够我们吃上几星期

translation.en: -♪ It's Freezie Day ♪ -♪ Oh, it's Freezie Day ♪
translation.zh: -今天是冰冻节-噢 是冰冻节

translation.en: I hope they ask us to clean up!
translation.zh: 希望大家会叫我们清理
冰冻节
各位 我们下一个冰冻节见吧！
明年见！
冰冻节
